Articles.Content:
Its so exciting that Kerbal foot prints, vehicle tracks and rocket scorch marks on planets and moon surfaces could be an awesome feature for KSP2.

Who agrees?

10 hours ago, Dman979 said:

 

Cant wait for interstellar travel and colonies

I'm excited to realistic graphics and colonies!

+ Actually, I'm excited to everything.

I'm excited about wether my computer will run this game and work on linux via proton.

Edited February 23, 2023 by Arugela
The thing that excites me the most is the good performance interstellar will potentially bring. A giant 500+ part colony ship at 60 fps.

多少钱

[Moderator added translation]

How much

Edited February 23, 2023 by James Kerman
Added Translation

以后有中文配音吗

[Moderator added translation]

Will there be Chinese dubbing in the future?

Edited February 23, 2023 by James Kerman
Added Translation

I can't wait to see players' creativity and genius come to life through KSP2 in the form of craft designs, mission profiles, mods, and more on a level equal to or exceeding the original game; as well as perhaps making a small contribution to this creativity myself.

我好想玩，但我的钱包好紧张(没钱)

[Moderator added translation]

I really want to play, but my wallet is so tight (no money)

Edited February 23, 2023 by James Kerman
Added Translation
I can't wait for a modern game engine to explore the Kerbal solar system for years to come!
I'm excited for colonisation
Im excited for procedural wings, planets, multiplayer and giveaway
I can't wait to wage war on my fellow kerbinauts in multiplayer.

I am excited for optimization and performance improvements as time goes on, as this encompasses many improvements (such as better graphics on lesser systems, craft with larger part count, and overall enjoy ability of the game). 
 

that and moar boosters.
I'm excited for KSP2 to be part of the in-flight entertainment suite on actual trips to the Moon & Mars!

Personally, orbital construction and colonies adds so much complexity to KSP and I'm really exited to see them in game. Interstellar is also going to put KSP at a new plane of existence as a space exploration game.
I know this is a long ways away but I can't wait for multiplayer be released!

Looking forward to resources and campaign progression, but also interesting post-1.0 collabs with NASA/ESA and the light. I’m rooting for a solar sail update! Physics time warp allows for it, the huge time scales of interstellar travel makes it makes sense, and would be a cool overlay toggle to see visualizations of solar wind and flares that you could surf on. 11 year cycle, and the weather repeats.

ooo also give us secret coordinates to Easter eggs encoded in a new solar system’s star’s sunspots!

I'm really excited to build cool looking rockets with all the new and updated parts and the painting tool without having to use mods! Also I can't wait for interstellar travel, that's gonna be awesome!!
yay
KSP2 is coming :v
I am most excited about the chance to have more meaningful progression mechanics (instead of old career mode) in KPS 2 with colonies and a new science system.

I am excited to see the how the game will get better and better in time. Each update will hopefully be a little step forward to the game i was waiting for, but the part i am excited about the most would probably be the "resource mode".

A lot of the new things this game has added are just completely out of the world. That being said the Interstellar travel will be probably one of the greatest things added to the game. With that the multiplayer system, imagining a convoy of the biggest structures ever made in Kerbalkind moving together to conquer new areas of the universe previously only a speck will honestly be an experience like no other.
